content: It was your birthday yesterday? And I only just realized today?
info: 特殊反馈-玩家生日第二天-1008热贝尔_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Let me give you your belated birthday wishes,
Then I'll get myself some memory potion while I'm at it.

content: Yesterday, I went out mining early in the morning, and by the time I got back, it was already past midnight. I'm sorry!

content: I-I-I think I m-missed y-your birthday, I'm s-so s-sorry bhan... Happy Birthday! May every day be filled with joy!
